text: Aue ehal-e-jannat ehal-e-dozakh ko pukaren gay kay hum say jo humaray rab ney wada farmaya tha hum ney to uss ko waqiyey kay mutabiq paya so tum say jo tumharay rab ney wada kiya tha tum ney bhi uss ko waqiyey kay mutabiq paya? Woh kahen gay haan phir aik pukarney wala dono kay darmiyan mein pukaray ga kay Allah ki maar ho inn zalimon per
